recipe.ingredients: - chicken breasts (boneless, skinless): 4 (6 ounces each) - olive oil: 2 tablespoons - lemon juice: 1/4 cup - garlic (minced): 2 cloves - dried oregano: 1 teaspoon - salt: 1/2 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/4 teaspoon - mixed salad greens: 6 cups - cherry tomatoes (halved): 1 cup - cucumber (sliced): 1 medium - red onion (sliced thinly): 1 small - feta cheese (crumbled, optional): 1/2 cup - kalamata olives (pitted, optional): 1/4 cup
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Chicken: In a bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, oregano, salt, and black pepper. Add chicken breasts and marinate for at least 30 minutes in the refrigerator. 2. Grill Chicken: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Grill chicken for about 6-7 minutes on each side or until fully cooked and juices run clear. Let it rest for a few minutes before slicing. 3. Assemble Salad: In a large salad bowl, toss together mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber slices, and red onion. 4. Add Extras: If using, sprinkle feta cheese and kalamata olives over the salad. 5. Serve: Top the salad with grilled chicken slices and serve immediately.
